code: class  Solution  {   public :   int  busyStudent ( vector < int >&  startTime ,  vector < int >&  endTime ,  int  queryTime )  {   const  int  n  =  startTime . size ();   int  ans  =  0 ;   for  ( int  i  =  0 ;  i  <  n ;  ++ i )   if  ( startTime [ i ]  <=  queryTime  &&  queryTime  <=  endTime [ i ])   ++ ans ;   return  ans ;   }  };
